name: CategoryTheory.instEffectiveEpiFamilyCompOfIsSplitEpi
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
α : Type u_2
B : C
X Y : α → C
f : (a : α) → Quiver.Hom (X a) B
g : (a : α) → Quiver.Hom (Y a) (X a)
inst✝¹ : ∀ (a : α), CategoryTheory.IsSplitEpi (g a)
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.EffectiveEpiFamily X f
⊢ CategoryTheory.EffectiveEpiFamily Y fun a => CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (g a) (f a)
decl:
instance {α : Type*} {B : C} {X Y : α → C}
    (f : (a : α) → X a ⟶ B) (g : (a : α) → Y a ⟶ X a) [∀ a, IsSplitEpi (g a)]
    [EffectiveEpiFamily _ f] : EffectiveEpiFamily _ (fun a ↦ g a ≫ f a) :=
  ⟨⟨effectiveEpiFamilyStructCompOfEffectiveEpiSplitEpi f g⟩⟩

name: CategoryTheory.IsSplitEpi.EffectiveEpi
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
B X : C
f : Quiver.Hom X B
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.IsSplitEpi f
⊢ CategoryTheory.EffectiveEpi f
decl:
instance IsSplitEpi.EffectiveEpi {B X : C} (f : X ⟶ B) [IsSplitEpi f] : EffectiveEpi f := by
  rw [← Category.comp_id f]
  infer_instance

name: CategoryTheory.effectiveEpiFamily_of_effectiveEpi_epi_comp
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
α : Type u_2
B : C
X Y : α → C
f : (a : α) → Quiver.Hom (X a) B
g : (a : α) → Quiver.Hom (Y a) (X a)
inst✝¹ : ∀ (a : α), CategoryTheory.Epi (g a)
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.EffectiveEpiFamily Y fun a => CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (g a) (f a)
⊢ CategoryTheory.EffectiveEpiFamily X f
decl:
lemma effectiveEpiFamily_of_effectiveEpi_epi_comp {α : Type*} {B : C} {X Y : α → C}
    (f : (a : α) → X a ⟶ B) (g : (a : α) → Y a ⟶ X a) [∀ a, Epi (g a)]
    [EffectiveEpiFamily _ (fun a ↦ g a ≫ f a)] : EffectiveEpiFamily _ f :=
  ⟨⟨effectiveEpiFamilyStructOfComp g f⟩⟩

name: CategoryTheory.effectiveEpi_of_effectiveEpi_epi_comp
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
B X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom X B
g : Quiver.Hom Y X
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.Epi g
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.EffectiveEpi (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g f)
⊢ CategoryTheory.EffectiveEpi f
decl:
lemma effectiveEpi_of_effectiveEpi_epi_comp {B X Y : C} (f : X ⟶ B) (g : Y ⟶ X)
    [Epi g] [EffectiveEpi (g ≫ f)] : EffectiveEpi f :=
  have := (effectiveEpi_iff_effectiveEpiFamily (g ≫ f)).mp inferInstance
  have := effectiveEpiFamily_of_effectiveEpi_epi_comp
    (X := fun () ↦ X) (Y := fun () ↦ Y) (fun () ↦ f) (fun () ↦ g)
  inferInstance

name: CategoryTheory.effectiveEpiFamilyStructCompIso_aux
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
B B' : C
α : Type u_2
X : α → C
π : (a : α) → Quiver.Hom (X a) B
i : Quiver.Hom B B'
W : C
e : (a : α) → Quiver.Hom (X a) W
h : ∀ {Z : C} (a₁ a₂ : α) (g₁ : Quiver.Hom Z (X a₁)) (g₂ : Quiver.Hom Z (X a₂)), Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g₁ (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (π a₁) i)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g₂ (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (π a₂) i)) → Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g₁ (e a₁)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g₂ (e a₂))
Z : C
a₁ a₂ : α
g₁ : Quiver.Hom Z (X a₁)
g₂ : Quiver.Hom Z (X a₂)
hg : Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g₁ (π a₁)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g₂ (π a₂))
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g₁ (e a₁)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp g₂ (e a₂))
decl:
theorem effectiveEpiFamilyStructCompIso_aux
    {W : C} (e : (a : α) → X a ⟶ W)
    (h : ∀ {Z : C} (a₁ a₂ : α) (g₁ : Z ⟶ X a₁) (g₂ : Z ⟶ X a₂),
      g₁ ≫ π a₁ ≫ i = g₂ ≫ π a₂ ≫ i → g₁ ≫ e a₁ = g₂ ≫ e a₂)
    {Z : C} (a₁ a₂ : α) (g₁ : Z ⟶ X a₁) (g₂ : Z ⟶ X a₂) (hg : g₁ ≫ π a₁ = g₂ ≫ π a₂) :
    g₁ ≫ e a₁ = g₂ ≫ e a₂ := by
  apply h
  rw [← Category.assoc, hg]
  simp

name: CategoryTheory.instEffectiveEpiFamilyComp
initialProofState:
C : Type u_1
inst✝² : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_1} C
B B' : C
α : Type u_2
X : α → C
π : (a : α) → Quiver.Hom (X a) B
i : Quiver.Hom B B'
inst✝¹ : CategoryTheory.EffectiveEpiFamily X π
inst✝ : CategoryTheory.IsIso i
⊢ CategoryTheory.EffectiveEpiFamily X fun a => CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (π a) i
decl: instance : EffectiveEpiFamily X (fun a ↦ π a ≫ i) := ⟨⟨effectiveEpiFamilyStructCompIso X π i⟩⟩
